Our Dresher employees supported the Kelly Anne Dolan Memorial Fund by adopting families throughout the Philadelphia region and providing holiday gifts to children with serious illnesses.
So proud of our Ascensus team for delivering clothes and toys for our adopted families.  Great job team.

As the lead Architect and Developer of Ascensus Retirement Consulting “formally for NRS, acquired by Ascensus in 2016” I designed, developed and coded an efficient TPA Status Tracking and Record Recording System. This workflow system keeps track of hundreds of events for many thousands of retirement plans, Billing, Accounting, HR, Reporting, Client Web Portal, Form-letters, Mail-merging, Compliance, Plan Document, Front End Sales and many more features.Besides the front end application development I also created many back-office supporting applications and services such as an annual admin project scheduler, reporting engine, OCR engine, Web Portal and then some.

National Retirement Services, an Ascencus Company. I design, develop, and enhance our business critical software platform / solution with 6 key applications and associated hardware. I report directly to the CFO and work closely with senior executive leadership and stakeholders across the enterprise and business users to determine enhancement / new feature requirements. I continuously improve solution functionality, usability, reliability, and robustness. Finally, I test all enhancements prior to release to ensure quality. Developed, deployed, and enhanced end-to-end company solution:-Created highly efficient application including robust, scalable, and user-friendly user interface fully integrated with database. -Enabled end-to-end project tracking including daily tasks, event reassignment, document delivery, and free text search. -Ensured extremely smooth, trouble-free, day-to-day project and business operations. -Delivered key tools to ensure on-time project closeout. -Provided full networking capabilities for 4 geographically disbursed offices, each with separate database. Developed and deployed multiple supporting applications:Scanning solution: -Provided high speed scanning of 100-200 pages / minute. -Reduced office paper load significantly. Billing System:Streamlined / rationalized billing process. Workflow System:-Enabled Account Managers to simultaneously administer a significantly increased number of plans through improved workflow efficiency.  Cost and Revenue Sharing Module: -Relieved accounting team /  account managers of repetitive tasks—enabling focus on higher value activities. Scheduling application: -Enabled background scheduling, new project creation, and delay notification capabilities. Barcode reader: -Automatically files barcode images into the correct directories. Image-to-Text Conversion (OCR): -Enabled free-text search of scanned images. Email Blast Module:-Streamlined and improved client communication.
Senior Software Engineer (Contract / Concurrent with National Retirement Services)

I was recruited based on recognized subject-matter expertise in imaging to write software solution to convert digital imaging and patient documentation to standard DICOM medical format. Worked closely with Germany-based university spin-off to determine requirements. -Developed library solution supporting optometric documentation ensuring compliance.
Computer Science and Programming Using Python

I worked with Jan side by side for 12 years while we wrote requirements and had him develop the proprietary application for NRS. We are still improving the application. You will not find a more diligent developer who sees ways of solving problems that others don't see. At every turn he was able to come up with solutions for a VERY complicated and intricate piece of software that has no match in the retirement plan industry. Besides being a stellar developer, Jan also understands many aspects of networks from a software and hardware perspective. He's a problem solver and very cool and collected when addressing critical issues. That's exactly what you want when someone is writing code under pressure. Jan is the first person I would go to any time I need to develop any application.

December 31, 2016, Jan Johannes reported directly to Marc

Marc is the most diligent multitasker I have ever met. I work with Marc for over 12 years at National Retirement Services, which was recently acquired by Ascensus. He continually impressed me and everyone else at the company with his ability to keep the company running smoothly. Marc handles the accounting, payroll, billing, cost-sharing, project manager and everything else what’s asked. If he cannot handle it himself, he delegates it, but still keeps it under control. He even managed the conversion from MS Exchange to Office 365 and most network related projects involving ATT. Whenever I have questions about the business logic in respect to development he is my go-to person and he never failed to help me out. His title is CFO but it should also include CIO and COO because that’s what he is in my opinion.

summary: As a Lead Software Architect / Engineer, I focus on leveraging my deep technical expertise to deliver effective, highly usable solutions to critical business problems. I work closely with business stakeholders and end-users to assess business impacting situations. I then go deep to discover the real core of the problem, which may not be immediately clear. I analyze possible solutions, select the best fit, and then rapidly deliver solutions that grow productivity and streamline efficiency with little to no business impact or downtime. In addition, I develop extremely robust designs that provide the most efficient way to get from point A to point B. I possess particular strengths in "connecting the dots" to ensure that key systems including hardware, scanners, printers and other devices are fully integrated with database solutions. This ability enables me to ensure that internal / external customers have the data they need when they need it. In addition to my technical strengths, I'm personable, and work effectively with stakeholders across the organization. End-users know they can come to me with their technical issues because they realize that I'm genuinely committed to making their work lives more productive.
name: Jan Johannes Dekkers
title: Leveraging deep technical expertise and superior interpersonal skills to improve end user productivity.
